name: [Codename]
description:
Mixing the third person shooter genre with Typing games. A special way for the player to interact with enemies - to eliminate enemies using the character's ability, you must use the keyboard and text input▮

/setting:

Cyberpunk, near future. Man has learned to digitize his personality and mind into cyberspace. The line between reality and digital reality is blurred. People are increasingly willing to prefer the virtual world to the real one. Local problems all over the planet began to develop into full-scale conflicts, in which all countries of the world are involved. The value of human life is declining every day. People are fleeing this world for their own good▮

/Synopsis:

A mega-corporation provides services for the “transit” of its personality for round sums, this has become the prerogative of a wealthy society. Tens of thousands of people have digitized their consciousness into binary code, but no one knows what really happened to them. Entire generations have left the real world in the hope of a better life. The main character receives an order from an unknown client to penetrate the main mainframe (server) of a megacorporation in order to copy important data and technologies▮
